sql.query: select mst_appno, comapp_companyname, mst_status, mst_holdusrid from commst_applications, comapplicant, organisations where mst_appid=comapp_id and org_code like '^' and org_scode=comapp_org_scode and comapp_oldid='^'
select nvl(substr(max(mst_appno),7,14),'0') as appno from commst_applications where substr(mst_appno,1,5)='^'

insert into commst_applications (mst_appno, mst_usrid, mst_holdusrid, mst_status, mst_prdcode, mst_appid, mst_applicationno, mst_orgscode, mst_createdate, mst_valuesin) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?)
update commst_applications set mst_prdcode=? where mst_appno=?

select mst_appno, mst_appid, comapp_companyname, mst_holdusrid, mst_status, mst_applicationno, mst_valuesin,org_name from commst_applications,comapplicant, organisations where comapp_id=mst_appid and mst_orgscode=org_scode and mst_appno='^'

select mstfacilities_appno, mstfacilities_headid, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=mstfacilities_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, mstfacilities_id, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=mstfacilities_id and facility_parent!=0) as facdesc, mstfacilities_sanclimit, mstfacilities_outstanding, mstfacilities_margin, to_char(mstfacilities_outstandason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mstfacilities_outstandason , mstfacilities_cbsaccno, mstfacilities_appint, mstfacilities_existint, mstfacilities_propint, mstfacilities_roremd, mstfacilities_coremd, mstfacilities_concession, mstfacilities_irregularties, mstfacilities_createdate, mstfacilities_sno, mstfacilities_facgroup,mstfacilities_zoremd from commst_facilities where mstfacilities_appno='^' and mstfacilities_facgroup='^'

insert into commst_facilities(mstfacilities_appno,mstfacilities_sno, mstfacilities_headid, mstfacilities_id, mstfacilities_sanclimit, mstfacilities_outstanding, mstfacilities_margin, mstfacilities_outstandason, mstfacilities_cbsaccno, mstfacilities_appint, mstfacilities_existint, mstfacilities_propint, mstfacilities_roremd, mstfacilities_coremd, mstfacilities_concession, mstfacilities_irregularties, mstfacilities_createdate, mstfacilities_facgroup) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?)
delete from commst_facilities where mstfacilities_appno=? and mstfacilities_sno=?
select nvl(max(mstfacilities_sno),0)+1 as facilityid from commst_facilities where mstfacilities_appno='^'

update commst_facilities set mstfacilities_headid=?, mstfacilities_id=?, mstfacilities_sanclimit=?, mstfacilities_outstanding=?, mstfacilities_margin=?, mstfacilities_outstandason=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), mstfacilities_cbsaccno=?, mstfacilities_appint=?, mstfacilities_existint=?, mstfacilities_propint=?, mstfacilities_roremd=?, mstfacilities_coremd=?, mstfacilities_concession=?, mstfacilities_irregularties=?, mstfacilities_zoremd=? where mstfacilities_appno=? and mstfacilities_sno=?
update commst_facilities set mstfacilities_outstandason=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where mstfacilities_appno=?

select mstsec_appno, mstsec_srlno, mstsec_id, mstsec_details, mstsec_value,to_char(mstsec_ason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mstsec_ason,mstsec_type, mstsec_tenor, mstsec_valuersname, mstsec_insuranceamt,to_char(mstsec_insexpirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mstsec_insexpirydate, mstsec_remarks, stat_data_desc as sec_name, mstsec_facsno from commst_securitydetails, static_data where stat_data_id(+)=12 and stat_data_desc1(+)=mstsec_id and mstsec_appno='^' order by mstsec_appno,mstsec_srlno

select mstsec_appno, mstsec_srlno, mstsec_id, mstsec_details, mstsec_value,to_char(mstsec_ason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mstsec_ason,mstsec_type, mstsec_tenor, mstsec_valuersname, mstsec_insuranceamt,to_char(mstsec_insexpirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mstsec_insexpirydate, mstsec_remarks, stat_data_desc as sec_name, mstsec_facsno from commst_securitydetails, static_data where stat_data_id(+)=12 and stat_data_desc1(+)=mstsec_id and mstsec_srlno='^' and mstsec_appno='^'

insert into commst_securitydetails (mstsec_appno, mstsec_srlno, mstsec_id, mstsec_details, mstsec_value, mstsec_ason,mstsec_type, mstsec_tenor, mstsec_valuersname, mstsec_insuranceamt,mstsec_insexpirydate, mstsec_remarks, mstsec_facsno) values (?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)

update commst_securitydetails set mstsec_id=?, mstsec_details=?, mstsec_value=?, mstsec_ason=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), mstsec_type=?, mstsec_tenor=?, mstsec_valuersname=?, mstsec_insuranceamt=?, mstsec_insexpirydate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), mstsec_remarks=?, mstsec_facsno=? where mstsec_appno=? and mstsec_srlno=?
delete from commst_securitydetails where mstsec_appno=? and mstsec_srlno=?
select mstsec_srlno, mstsec_details, mstsec_remarks, mstsec_facsno from commst_securitydetails where mstsec_facsno='^' and mstsec_appno='^'
select nvl(max(mstsec_srlno),0)+1 as snomax from commst_securitydetails where mstsec_appno='^'
select mstfacilities_sno, facility_catdesc, mstfacilities_sanclimit from facility_master a, commst_facilities b where a.facility_catid= b.mstfacilities_id and b.mstfacilities_appno='^'

select otrsancterms_appno ,otrsancterms_slrno, otrsancterms_terms ,otrsancterms_modification ,otrsancterms_justification from commst_otrsancterms where otrsancterms_appno='^' order by otrsancterms_terms
delete from commst_otrsancterms where otrsancterms_appno=? and otrsancterms_slrno=?
update commst_otrsancterms set otrsancterms_terms=?, otrsancterms_modification=?, otrsancterms_justification=? where otrsancterms_appno=? and otrsancterms_slrno=?
select nvl(max(otrsancterms_slrno),0)+1 as snomax from commst_otrsancterms where otrsancterms_appno='^'
insert into commst_otrsancterms(otrsancterms_appno, otrsancterms_slrno, otrsancterms_terms, otrsancterms_modification, otrsancterms_justification ) values (?,?,?,?,?)
select valofacct_appno, valofacct_slno, valofacct_previous, valofacct_current from commst_valofacct where valofacct_appno='^' order by valofacct_slno
insert into commst_valofacct (valofacct_appno, valofacct_slno, valofacct_previous, valofacct_current) values (?,?,?,?)
delete from commst_valofacct where valofacct_appno=?

select remarks_appno, remarks_orglevel, remarks_comments, remarks_signatures, remarks_refno, to_char(remarks_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as remarks_date from commst_remarks where remarks_appno='^' and remarks_orglevel in (^)
insert into commst_remarks (remarks_appno, remarks_orglevel, remarks_comments) values (?,?,?)
update commst_remarks set remarks_signatures=?, remarks_refno=?, remarks_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where remarks_appno=?
delete from commst_remarks where remarks_appno=? and remarks_orglevel=?
select recmd_appno, recmd_srlno, recmd_sancterms, recmd_stipulated, recmd_recommendRO, recmd_recommendCO from commst_recommendations where recmd_appno='^' order by recmd_srlno
insert into commst_recommendations (recmd_appno, recmd_srlno, recmd_sancterms, recmd_stipulated, recmd_recommendRO, recmd_recommendCO) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from commst_recommendations where recmd_appno=? and recmd_srlno=?
select nvl(max(recmd_srlno),0)+1 as snomax from commst_recommendations where recmd_appno='^'
update commst_recommendations set recmd_sancterms=?, recmd_stipulated=?, recmd_recommendRO=?, recmd_recommendCO=? where recmd_appno=? and recmd_srlno=?
insert into commst_mailbox(mstmail_appno, mstmail_fromusrid, mstmail_tousrid, mstmail_fromflowpoint, mstmail_toflowpoint, mstmail_date) values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)
update commst_applications set mst_holdusrid=?, mst_mailchkstatus='Y' where mst_appno=?
update commst_applications set mst_status=?, mst_processedusrid=?, mst_processdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), mst_processorgscode=?, mst_sancauthcomments=? where mst_appno=?
update commst_applications set mst_status = concat('c',substr(mst_status,2,2)), mst_closeddate=sysdate where mst_appno=?

select mstmail_fromusrid||'-'||usr1.usr_fname||' '||usr1.usr_lname as fromuser, mstmail_tousrid||'-'||usr2.usr_fname||' '||usr2.usr_lname as touser,mstmail_fromflowpoint,mstmail_toflowpoint, to_char(mstmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as maildate, mstmail_fromusrid, mstmail_tousrid from commst_mailbox, users usr1,users usr2 where mstmail_appno like '^' and mstmail_fromusrid=usr1.usr_id and mstmail_tousrid=usr2.usr_id order by mstmail_date
select count(mst_prdcode)from commst_applications where mst_prdcode='^'
select mst_appno, mst_usrid, mst_holdusrid, mst_processedusrid, mst_sancauthcomments, mst_status from commst_applications where mst_appno= '^'

select prd_flowpoint, wrk_flowname, prd_maxclass, prd_function,stat_data_desc1 from prd_workflow, workflow, static_data where prd_code=(select mst_prdcode from commst_applications where mst_appno='^') and prd_flowpoint ^ ^ and prd_flowpoint ^ ^ and prd_workid=wrk_flowid and stat_data_id='7' and stat_data_desc=prd_maxclass order by prd_flowpoint
select count(MSTMAIL_FROMFLOWPOINT) from commst_mailbox where MSTMAIL_APPNO='^' and MSTMAIL_FROMFLOWPOINT=^

select mstmail_toflowpoint, to_char(mstmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as mstmail_date, to_char(prd_duration+mstmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate, prd_maxclass from commst_mailbox, commst_applications, prd_workflow where mstmail_date=(select max(mstmail_date) from commst_mailbox where mstmail_appno='^') and mstmail_toflowpoint=prd_flowpoint and mstmail_appno=mst_appno and prd_code=mst_prdcode and mst_appno='^'

select prd_maxclass, to_char(MST_CREATEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as createdate, to_char(prd_duration+MST_CREATEDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as duedate from commst_applications, prd_workflow where prd_flowpoint=1 and prd_code=mst_prdcode and MST_APPNO='^'
insert into commst_mailcomments (mail_appno, mail_comments, mail_userid, mail_date, mail_touser, mail_pano) values (?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)

select mail_appno, mail_comments, mail_userid, to_char(mail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as mail_date, mail_touser, user_designation, usr_fname, mail_pano from commst_mailcomments, users where mail_appno='^' and mail_userid=usr_id order by mail_date desc
select prd_skip, prd_approval from prd_authority, commst_applications where prd_code=mst_prdcode and mst_appno='^'

select org_name, org_add1, org_add2, org_zip, org_phone, org_fax, state_name, city_name from commst_applications, organisations, laps_states, laps_cities where mst_orgscode= organisations.org_scode and city_code(+)=org_city and state_code(+)=org_state and mst_appno='^'
select comapp_companyname,org_name,comapp_businessnature from comapplicant, organisations, commst_applications where comapp_id=mst_appid and comapp_org_scode=org_scode and mst_appno='^'
select currentrating_basemodel from ramtolaps105, commst_applications where appno=mst_applicationno and mst_appno='^'
select com_propassettype from com_compproposal, commst_applications where com_propappno = mst_applicationno and mst_appno='^'
select fin_comments from commst_fincomments where fin_appno='^' and fin_pagetype='^' and fin_divid='^'
delete from commst_fincomments where fin_appno=? and fin_pagetype=? and fin_divid=?
insert into commst_fincomments (fin_appno,fin_pagetype,fin_divid,fin_comments) Values(?,?,?,?)

select count(mst_appno) from commst_applications, organisations, comapplicant where comapp_id=mst_appid and org_scode=mst_orgscode and mst_holdusrid='^' and upper(mst_status) not like 'C_' and mst_mailchkstatus='Y'

select mst_appno, comapp_companyname, org_name, mst_status, mstmail_fromusrid, to_char(mstmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mstmail_date from commst_mailbox a, commst_applications, comapplicant, organisations where a.mstmail_date=(select max(b.mstmail_date) from commst_mailbox b where b.mstmail_appno=a.mstmail_appno) and a.mstmail_tousrid=mst_holdusrid and a.mstmail_appno=mst_appno and comapp_id=mst_appid and org_scode=mst_orgscode and mst_holdusrid='^' and upper(mst_status) not like 'C_' and mst_mailchkstatus='Y' and mst_delflag='N'

select mstsec_appno, mstsec_srlno, mstsec_id, mstsec_details, mstsec_value,to_char(mstsec_ason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mstsec_ason,mstsec_type, mstsec_tenor, mstsec_valuersname, mstsec_insuranceamt,to_char(mstsec_insexpirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mstsec_insexpirydate, mstsec_remarks, stat_data_desc as sec_name from commst_securitydetails, static_data where stat_data_id(+)=12 and stat_data_desc1(+)=mstsec_id and mstsec_appno='^' and mstsec_type='Collateral' order by mstsec_appno,mstsec_srlno

select app_no, app_valuesin from applications a, com_demographics where app_processdate=(select max(app_processdate) from applications b where b.app_no=a.app_no) and upper(app_status) like '_A' and upper(app_delflag)='N' and app_no=demo_appno and demo_comappid in ^ order by app_no desc
select count(mst_appno) as appcount from commst_applications where mst_appid in ^ and upper(mst_status) not like 'C_'

insert into commst_facilities(mstfacilities_appno, mstfacilities_sno, mstfacilities_headid, mstfacilities_id, mstfacilities_sanclimit, mstfacilities_cbsaccno, mstfacilities_createdate, mstfacilities_facgroup) select ?, facility_sno, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_proposed, cbs_accountno, sysdate, facility_group from facilities where facility_appno=?

insert into commst_securitydetails(mstsec_appno, mstsec_facsno,mstsec_srlno,mstsec_id, mstsec_details,mstsec_value, mstsec_ason,mstsec_type,mstsec_tenor,mstsec_valuersname,mstsec_insuranceamt, mstsec_insexpirydate, mstsec_remarks) select ?, sec_facsno,sec_srlno,sec_desc_id, sec_desc_details,sec_desc_value, sec_desc_as_on_date,sec_type,sec_tenor,sec_valuersname,sec_insuranceamt, sec_insexpirydate, sec_remarks from fac_security_details where sec_appno=?
select nvl(sum(FACILITY_PROPOSED),0) as proposed from FACILITIES where facility_appno='^' and facility_category in('R') and facility_group='0'
select max(prd_flowpoint) as maxflowpoint from prd_workflow,workflow,commst_applications where prd_workid=wrk_flowid and prd_code=mst_prdcode and wrk_flowtype='p' and mst_appno='^'
